    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1285</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Israel Travel and Activity Guide</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Israel Spielraum und Aktivität Anleitung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Voyage de l'Israel et guide d'activité</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Curso de Israel e guia da atividade</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Corsa dell'Israele e guida di attività</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οδηγός ταξιδιού και δραστηριότητας του Ισραήλ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Recorrido de Israel y guía de la actividad</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A guide to planning an Israel Activity day using learning Stations. learners "visit" Jerusalem, Safed, Massada and Tel Aviv.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Israel Activity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Jerusalem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Safed</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Massada</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Tel Aviv</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">travel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">guide</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Anleitung zur Planung eines Israel 
Aktivität Tages mit erlernenstationanfängern "Besuch" Jerusalem, 
Safed, Massada und Tel Aviv.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un guide de projeter un jour d'activité de 
l'Israel en utilisant les étudiants d'étude "visite" Jérusalem, 
Safed, Massada et Tel Aviv de stations.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma guia a planear um dia da atividade de Israel 
usando learners de aprendizagem "visita" Jerusalem, Safed, Massada e 
Telavive das estações.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una guida a progettare un giorno di attività 
dell'Israele usando i principianti imparanti "chiamata" Gerusalemme, 
Safed, Massada e Tel Aviv delle stazioni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένας οδηγός για τον προγραμματισμό ημερησίως 
δραστηριότητας του Ισραήλ που χρησιμοποιεί τους μαθαίνοντας 
αρχαρίους "επίσκεψη" Ιερουσαλήμ, Safed, Massada και Τελ Αβίβ
σταθμών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una guía a planear un día de la actividad de 
Israel usando a principiantes "visita" Jerusalén, Safed, Massada y 
Tel Aviv de las estaciones que aprenden.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Israel Aktivität</string>
          </keyword>

          <keyword>
